law.text: An optometrist who, by final order of the board has been subjected to any disciplinary action may file an appeal. The action on appeal shall be filed with the Circuit Court of the county in which the violation occurred in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B. The commencement of proceedings under this section shall not operate as a stay on the board's order, unless specifically ordered otherwise by the court.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 14, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 281, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 256, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990.
